title: Monica

text:
{{wiktionary|monica|Monica}}
'''Monica''' may refer to:
{{TOC right}}
==People==
*[[Monica (actress)]] (born 1987), Indian film actress 
*[[Monica (given name)]], a given name (including a list of people and characters with the name)
*[[Monica (singer)]] (born 1980), American  R&B singer, songwriter, producer, and actress
*[[Saint Monica]], mother of Augustine

==Places==

* [[833 Monica]], a minor planet
* [[Monica, Kentucky]]
* [[Santa Monica, California]]

==Arts, entertainment, and media==
===Fiction===
*[[Monica (2011 film)|''Monica'' (2011 film)]], an Indian film
*[[Monica (2022 film)|''Monica'' (2022 film)]], an American-Italian film
*Monica, a fictional country in ''[[Æon Flux]]''
*Monica, a fictional planet in David Weber's science fiction [[Honorverse]]

===Music===
* MONICA, a Scottish band featuring members of [[Win (band)|Win]]/[[The Apples (Scottish band)|The Apples]] and [[Trembling Bells]]
*[[Monica (song)|"Monica" (song)]], a song by The Kinks from their album ''The Kinks Are the Village Green Preservation Society'' (1968)
*"Monica", a song by Dan Bern from his album ''[[Fifty Eggs (album)|Fifty Eggs]]''
*"Monica", a 1984 song by [[Kōji Kikkawa]]
**[[Leslie Cheung]], covered into Cantonese in 1984
** [[Leo Ku]], another Cantonese cover song

==Vehicles and transportation==
*[[Monica (automobile)]]
*[[Monica (radar)]]
*[[Monica (rocket)]]
*{{MV|Monica}}, a Finnish coaster ship in service 1955–57

==Other uses==
*[[Monica (grape)]]
*[[Tropical Storm Monica (disambiguation)]], various
**[[Cyclone Monica]], a tropical cyclone

==See also==

*[[Monika (disambiguation)]]
*[[Moniker]]
*[[Monique (disambiguation)]]
*[[Santa Monica (disambiguation)]]
**[[Santa Monica, California]], USA
